title1: Love is an attitude. <u>We are Viva Boa Vista</u>
description1: Our OSC in Jacare√≠ offers safety, education, and love, transforming lives in a vibrant and welcoming environment. We cultivate a space where every interaction is guided by love.
bronzeSubtitle: Basic level of contribution. Financial support for non-profit organizations.
goldSubtitle: Highest level of contribution. Networking and participation in strategic decisions.
silverSubtitle: Public recognition and access to exclusive events. Greater involvement with the institution.
quote: Love goes beyond feelings. Love is an attitude. In every act of kindness, every word of support, every moment of dedication, love manifests not just as a passive feeling, but as a dynamic and transformative action. Love is an attitude because it requires more than feeling; it demands doing.
cardText1: Our purpose is to help those who need it most. What is yours?

title4: Become a Transformative Agent and Support VIVA!
subtitle4: Join our mission to transform lives and make a difference in the world. Be an agent of change and help create a better future for the OSC.
